name.ja: <ruby>星辰響手<rt>ドラゴンテイル</rt></ruby>プリクル

text.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Dragon Tail" monster in your GY, except "Dragon Tail Phrixl"; Special Summon it, then return 1 monster you control to the hand. If this card is sent to the GY as material for a Fusion Summon: You can Set 1 "Dragon Tail" Spell/Trap from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Dragon Tail Phrixl" once per turn.
